1.19.1.6.0: Added support for: Smooth Basalt, Amethyst, Calcite, Tuff, Cracked Nether Brick, Cracked Deepslate Bricks, Cracked Deepslate Tiles
1.19.1.6.1: Added minecraft:trapdoor data tags to existing blocks.  Added block tags mineable/axe mineable/pickaxe mineable/shovel (please report if any are missing or incorrect. i left wool in both for now since theres no shears tag). Update zh_tw.json #41 by StarskyXIII.  Update ru_ru.json  #40 by BardinTheDwarf. Obsidian and End stone type blocks added to minecraft:dragon_immune data tag, matching their parent blocks. Fix some walls having wrong Material (wood vs stone)
1.19.1.6.2: Fix datapack format warning.Port to mc 1.18.1 to 1.18.2.  Requires Forge 40.0.12+
1.19.1.7.0: Compat added for Sculk, Mud, Packed Mud, Mangrove, Ochre Pearlescent Verdant Froglights, Reinforced Deepslate.  Add 7 slabs, 7 stairs, 10 walls, one gate, one trapdoor.
